meanings.definition: Resembling an oven in appearance or function.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen felt warm and ovenlike as the cookies baked in the oven.
meanings.sent2: The cozy room had an ovenlike warmth that made everyone feel comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The ovenlike heat from the fireplace made the whole house toasty.
meanings.sent4: The sun's rays created an ovenlike effect, warming up the room quickly.
meanings.sent5: The ovenlike temperature outside made it perfect for a picnic.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to those of an oven.
meanings.sent1: The ovenlike smell of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The ovenlike heat of the desert made it difficult to stay outside for long.
meanings.sent3: The ovenlike glow of the campfire lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent4: The ovenlike warmth of the blanket kept her cozy on cold nights.
meanings.sent5: The ovenlike appearance of the machine made it easy to mistake it for an actual oven.
